other_tests.changes_over_time: Left ventricular ejection fraction declined to 15% with severe diffuse hypokinesis, regional wall-motion abnormalities, and moderate mitral regurgitation upon later examination.

other_tests.findings: Generalized slowing with near-complete suppression of cerebral activity.
Expansion of unstable CTG repeats in the DMPK gene, with 306 CTG repeats.
Severe myopathic changes with atrophy of predominantly type I fibers; features indicative of myotonic dystrophy type 1.
